name: Pyramidis
description:
This game was made for my study where to goal was to make a multiplayer game.

General

This is a multiplayer game that requries 1 player to be the host and the other one to be a client. 

If the clients aren't connected via the same network some port forwarding may have to be done.

The game uses the port 42069.

Controls WASDMoveSpaceConfirm/InteractEscapeCancel/Leave InteractAlt+EnterToggle Fullscreen
